description:
At Russman Law Firm, attorney Ryan Russman proudly and efficiently serves personal injury, wills and estate planning clients throughout New Hampshire.

At our firm we are committed to excellence and committed to you. We have offices located throughout New Hampshire, but we are based in Exeter. While Mr. Russman is known best for his experience in DUI law, his legal experience extends in personal injury and estate planning. Our clients' rights are important to us, and we will do whatever it takes to reach the best possible outcome for each of our clients.

If you have been accused of a DUI or and you were injured in an accident, you deserve an attorney who will aggressively fight for your rights. If you are looking to plan for both your future and the future of your loved ones, it is important that you hire a lawyer who can see the big picture during such an emotional time.

Attorney Russman is the only board-certified DWI defense lawyer in New Hampshire, by the ABA-accredited National College for DUI Defense. He has also written two books on DWI in New Hampshire.

Serving as proponents of being thriving members of our community and promoting the future of our youth, Mr. Russman has taught at the New Hampshire Bar Association.

We offer free consultations, we accept all major credit cards and we will work on the weekends for our clients. Call 603-772-3433 for more information.
